description:
Summary:

Transfer Confirmation Details are scrollable

Steps to reproduce:

Transfer > Click any Transfer from pop-up > Fill Details and Review

Expected behaviour:

Confirmation Details are scrollable

Observed behaviour:

Instead, they should be non-scrollable, for better User Experience

Device and Android version:

Marshmallow, Xiaomi
name: Mifos - Self-Service App - Transfer Confirmation Details are scrollable
